title: Tomorrowland Music Festival Comes to Thailand
summary: Tomorrowland is a big music festival from Europe that plays electronic dance music. It is coming to Asia for the first time ever, and it will be in Thailand. The festival will happen in December in a beach town called Pattaya. Many people, over 50,000 each day, are expected to go. Tickets will go on sale in January, and there are passes for one day or all three days. Thailand was picked because it is becoming popular for music and tourism. This festival will help Thailand make money and bring fun to music lovers. It is a special event because it is the first full festival like this in Asia.

keywords.explanation: a famous music festival from Europe that plays electronic dance music
a country in Asia where the festival will be held
a beach town in Thailand where the festival takes place
passes you buy to go to the festival
people who enjoy listening to and going to music events

In which month will the festival happen in Thailand?
What type of music does Tomorrowland play?
How many people are expected to attend each day?
When does pre-registration for tickets start?
Why was Thailand chosen for the festival?
options: For its growing music and tourism
questions.correct_answer: For its growing music and tourism

background_read: Tomorrowland is a big music festival that started in Belgium 20 years ago. It is known for fun parties and creative stages. Many people from around the world go to it. Now, it is expanding to Asia for the first time, choosing Thailand because it is becoming a popular place for music events and tourism. This festival will help bring more visitors and money to Thailand.
Article_Structure: WHO: Tomorrowland, a European music festival, and Thailand, the host country.
WHAT: Tomorrowland is holding its first full festival in Asia in Thailand.
WHERE: In Pattaya, a beach town in Thailand.
WHY: To expand to a new continent and boost tourism and music in Thailand.

perspectives.description: People who love music are happy because they can enjoy a big festival in Asia.
Thailand will make money and attract more tourists from this festival.
